profile.description: We are a marketing agency and software development company from Montenegro working in marketing services, software development, AI development, and video game development. We have 2 startups: 1. One making educational video games and apps for HR, compliance, and SDG. 2. Another creating AI products based on machine learning and large language models in the domain name industry.

Codepixel is a Montenegro-based digital product development company that blends engineering, design and AI to improve business operations and accelerate growth. Services include: Strategy & advisory (helping define the right product, business-goals alignment), Engineering & design (building web and mobile apps, UI/UX design, custom software), Operations & support (post-launch maintenance, scaling, supporting product lifecycles). Tech stack: .NET, Angular, Vue, Node, React, cloud/DevOps, IoT.
Digital marketing company that also works on innovative projects, computer programming, and AI projects. Core business is digital marketing with expansion into adtech and innovation.

Digital product design and development company. Services: Product discovery, Product design, Product development, AI transformation and development, Cloud infrastructure and operations, Web & mobile development, Enterprise solutions development. Focus on fintech, edutech, healthtech industries. Does not apply for tenders in gaming, military, gambling and beverage industries.

IT company focused on production and sales of own software solutions and complete solutions including third party hardware. Tenders typically include IT infrastructure (computing, communication, security), custom-made software solutions for financial sector, and proprietary software solutions.
Software company with proprietary ERP solution.

IT cluster uniting over 45 IT companies. Focus on ensuring cluster sustainability (capacity building) and delivering benefits for member companies. Areas: digital transformation (IT solutions development, knowledge transfer with EU partners, collaboration with academia and public administration), education programs (Cortex academy for students and unemployed, training for employees), innovation development, creative industries (gaming).
Service company serving businesses in healthcare, digital transformation (DX), practices and AI. Looking for software services opportunities.

European Grouping of Territorial Cooperation (EGTC) bringing together partners from Hungary, Croatia and Bosnia-Herzegovina. Works on cross-border regional development, EU-funded projects, climate resilience, innovation and sustainable mobility. Acts as a stable cross-border platform that develops strategies, coordinates activities, and implements EU projects. Goal is joint economic development of border region and supporting European integration of Western Balkan countries through international partnership building and joint project generation.
